name: Potsy Goacher
introduction: Paul "Potsy" Goacher (born April 8, 1917 in Anderson, Indiana, United States  died February 9, 1986 in Anderson) was a United States racing driver who entered four Indianapolis 500 races, two as reserve driver and two as the main driver, but did not start any of them.  He holds the record for the most American Championship Car races entered but not started, with 10.
